newsitem.title: UK: Stagecoach unit wins 33 mln stg leasing deal.
newsitem.headline: Stagecoach unit wins 33 mln stg leasing deal.

text.p: British rail and bus operator Stagecoach Holdings Plc said on Tuesday its subsidiary Porterbrook Leasing Company Ltd had agreed a maintenance and management package with West Midlands Passenger Transport Executive (Centro) and Central Trains Ltd worth 33 million stg.

Under the terms of an 18-year lease agreement, Porterbrook will manage 12 Class 323 vehicles. The initial contract for seven years is worth 13 million stg and, including future lease options, is valued at 33 million, Stagecoach said in a statement.
